overview: “To Revolution Square” is the name of a documentary short film directed by Hossein Rajabian, the Iranian filmmaker.  It portrays the commute of the common people in the Iranian capital city of Tehran who have to take the bus to go " to Revolution Square " on a daily basis. During the movie, people come to listen to strange radio news while they are on the bus. However, they are extremely dispassionate and do not show any special reaction to the unbelievable reports.
title: To Revolution Square
